title: Candelabra, one of a pair
description: Pair of Candelabra, three-armed with pendants; crystal; lead glass; parts numbered as follows a.base, b.top star, c.side star, d.side star, e.center spire, f.back arm, g.back arm, h.side arm, i.side arm, j.front arm, k.finial, l.candle holder, m.candle holder
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wayne H. MacFarlane
